content: I have a use case where some ServiceRequest need to be authorized by more than one party. What would be the correct way to do that? I looked at Consent but that feels wrong because the focus there is healthcare consumer. Would Contract be an option or something else?

ServiceRequest.author would be the individual who takes primary responsibility for initiating the ServiceRequest. However, anyone else involved in the review/sign-off can be captured using Provenance.
I did not consider Provenance but that makes sense indeed tx!
